We believe that open environmental information and shared knowledge is paramount to ensuring a vital Chesapeake Bay.

We help Bay restoration partners access, organize, and share environmental data.

Access

We help stakeholders access public data in an open format for their Bay focused projects.

Organize

We help stakeholders structure new or existing data sources so they are made instantly available for analysis, mapping, and application development.

Share

We help restoration partners share their data through integrated social media and our open developer platform, Commons Cloud.

With education and strategy, beautiful visualizations, and our open data repository.

Education + Strategy

We show organizations how to create efficient workflows around data management and create maps that are functional and informative.

Visualizations

We help turn raw data into knowledge by building visualizations that inform smart and effective Bay restoration policies.

Data

We openly share a variety of Bay-centric datasets for use that are maintained by our network of partners and other restoration professionals.

Chesapeake Commons is a resource that enables small watershed organizations, foundations, and government to turn raw data into knowledge that sparks information transparency, public engagement, and effective Bay restoration action.

Chesapeake Commons is a resource that enables small watershed organizations, foundations, and government to turn raw data into knowledge that sparks information transparency, public engagement, and effective Bay restoration action.

We are located at 1875 Connecticut Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20009. Our offices are located at WeWork's Washington, DC innovative working space.
